alt: A symmetrical glass façade unveiling a modern café-bar-restaurant interior—with glowing pendant lights and colorful seating—perfectly mirrored in a shallow reflecting pool below.
A bright spring close-up of white-and-pink cherry blossoms against a clear blue sky, with a honeybee perched on a central bloom gathering nectar.
A solitary dark-feathered bird foraging on a mossy garden lawn, framed by softly blurred pink-toned shrubs and an evergreen bush in the foreground.
